name: Color Dash (MatildaGronholm, MyRosengren)
description:
Stay on the rainbow and find treasures to get on the highscore list. Enjoy!

Controls: 

Menu mode: Use "W" to move up, "S" to move down, press "1" to select

Player one: Use "A " to move right, "D" to move left and press "1"  to jump

Player two: Use arrows to move, press "L" to jump
